item.description: […] The understanding of the Electrochemical aspects of Human physiology as well as the Electromagnetic aspects of Classical Physics all lead to much searching for answers only where the Lamp already sheds light. Good to see Hoyle referenced in the paper. Hoyle and Alfven’s work on steady state cosmonogy and Plasma physics are all neglected in the Higgs Boson wild goose chases of modern physics in the academy /2020/02/28/report-on-probability-a-the-mathematics-of-language-t… […]
